name: Horror Game (Crazy Man Games)
description: Now there isn't much story and heck there isn't a name yet but there are horrors of unimaginable guns galore and my lovely voice. And as of now, there are no updates coming soon because I am moving the game to a new version of unity and while I am doing that I am rewriting all of the scripts to allow for smoother running and just better game play which is proving very difficult especially for my buttons. Enjoy.
